topic.title: HEAD /gemfire-api/v1/{region}
topic.shortdesc: An HTTP HEAD request that returns region's size (number of entries) within the HEADERS, which is a response without the content-body. Region size is specified in the pre-defined header named "Resource-Count".

section.title: Example Request
section.codeblock: Request Payload: null HEAD /gemfire-api/v1/customers Response Payload: null

section.title: Example Success Response
section.codeblock:
200 OK
Content-Length: <#-of-bytes> Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8 ...
Resource-Count: 8192
